## Notes

<notexml>Patricia A., 80, died April 4, 2009. Born in Williams, Arizona, she graduated from Williams High School and Stephens College in Columbia, MO. Patricia married Howard Birch in 1949 and moved to Tucson in 1968. She is survived by her husband, Howard R. Birch; son, Michael Birch; daughters, Michele A. Parrett and Melanie Garliepp and five grandchildren. Memorial Service 10:00 a.m. Friday, April 10, 2009 at BRING&apos;S BROADWAY CHAPEL, 6910 E. Broadway. https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/tucson/name/patricia-birch-obituary?id=23564062 </notexml>
